This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: Odd flashing lights and odd planes disappearing and leaving behind a horizontal row of pinkish redish lights.
divs: sighting detailsmonday night at exactly nine pm i was getting into my car and happened to look at the north eastern sky at the same time and saw an odd blinking red and white light on what i thought was airplane moving from the northwest towards the east. it appeared odd to me as the lights blinked more often than that of a normal plane and the way the way it flew in what i perceived as being in very quick spurts made me watch it for a few seconds. as i was watching another set of blinking lights appeared to the right and pretty darn close to the first plane. i then looked at the first plane again and thought the planes were heading toward each other and i was hoping they were just playing games and would not crash in mid-air. then all of a sudden the first plane, the one of the left, disappeared and reappeared to the second plane's right and seconds later approximately 10 little red\pink balls strung out horizontally and then quickly disappeared. i dont remember looking for the planes after the light display. just before the second plane appeared i was able to make out a shape for the first plane. i can best describe it as a right angle, meaning it was missing a wing and tail and it's body and only wing were of equal size and length. i dont recall hardly any details about the second plane. i only noticed its lights. answer to number 5: when i saw the first plane disappear i was very excited and hoping i was watching ufos. when the pinkish red lights appeared i was juggling my phone in my hand trying to get the camera working but i was way too excited to think how to get it to operate. i wasnt scared but i was disappointed after my sighting because more than likely what i saw was a military exercise.
